mapper.select: SELECT orders.order_id ,orders.goods_id ,orders.user_id ,goods.goods_name ,goods.goods_desc ,goodstype.goodstype_desc ,goods.goods_getprice ,orders.address_id , shoppingaddress.consignee_address ,orders.senddate ,orders.payment ,orders.sendprice ,orders.order_state ,orders.order_date FROM goods ,orders , shoppingaddress , goodstype WHERE orders.goods_id = goods.goods_id AND orders.address_id = shoppingaddress.address_id AND goods.goodstype_id = goodstype.goodstype_id and orders.user_id = #{orders.user_id}
